verbs.description: she [V: was] robbed charged norman when margie allred was hospitalized in june after suffering a stroke she thought the sensible thing to do was to give her daughter power of attorney over her affairs turns out that was my biggest mistake allred said when the 69-year - old moore resident came out of the hospital in august she discovered her checking and savings accounts had been cleaned out allred soon learned her house and pickup were no longer registered in her name state department of human services officials say allred case is far from uncommon of the 16 280 elder abuse cases investigated in fiscal year 2005 14 percent involved financial exploitation margie allred
